recipes.title: Gruzincha tovuq«Shkmeruli»
recipes.method: Qadam 1: Tovuq sonini terisidan tozalab, salfetkada quritamiz. Qadam 2: Tovuq soniga tuz, murch va paprika qo’shib, yaxshilab aralashtiramiz. Ziravorlar go’shtning barcha tomonini qoplashi kerak. 2. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. 3. Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid. 4. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Lavashdan ruletchalar
recipes.method: Qadam 1: Bodringni ingichka somoncha shaklida to’g’raymiz. Qadam 2: Tuxum va qisqichbaqa tayoqchalarini mayda kubik shaklida to’g’raymiz. Qadam 3: 2 ta lavash xamirini ustma-ust qo’yamiz. Mayonez surtamiz.

recipes.title: Tomat qaylasi ostida go’shtli «Atirgullar»
recipes.method: Qadam 1: Barcha masalliqlarni tayyorlaymiz. Qadam 2: Xamir Tayyorlaymiz. Chuqur idishda tuxum, suv, o’simlik yog’i va tuzni aralashtiramiz.
